awd_titl_txt: A System for Dimensional Inspection of Mechanical Parts
awd_abstract_narration: The objective of this project is to study "electronic                      gaging" and create a system for automatic dimensional                           inspection of mechanical parts.  The focus of this project is                   on developing theories and methods needed for systematically                    comparing the geometric variations of measured-features with                    their allowed tolerances.                                                            The approach to the data analysis is based on decomposing                  the measurement data into a set of features, and extracting                     their measures of imperfection.  A set of formal definitions                    will be developed to express the meaning of such measures of                    imperfection as size, form, orientation, and position.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
